text: Sam Clemmett is a British actor best known for his role as Albus Potter in the play Harry Potter and the Cursed Child. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+Film !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2013 |Foyle's War' |Jack Shaw |Series 7 |- |2013 |Doctors |Olly Whitehall | |- |2013 |Burn the Clock (Short Film) |Jay | |- |2014 |Haribo Tangfastic advert | | |- |2014 |Our World War (TV Mini- Series) |Bill Foulkes | |- |2014 |Holby City |Tay Simons | |- |2015 |Murder Games: The Life and Death of Breck Bednar (TV Movie documentary) | | |- |2015 |Survivor |Teen With Phone | |- |2016 |The Musketeers |Luc |} {| class="wikitable" |+Stage !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2016–2017 |Harry Potter and the Cursed Child |Albus Severus Potter |West End at the Palace Theatre (originated the role on the West End) |- |2018–2019 |Harry Potter and the Cursed Child |Albus Severus Potter |Broadway at the Lyric Theatre (originated the role on Broadway) |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Sam Clemmett on the Harry Potter and the Cursed Child website Category:21st- century English male actors Category:1993 births Category:Actors from Norfolk Category:English male child actors Category:English male film actors Category:English male television actors Category:Living people Category:People from Brundall, Norfolk
title: Sam Clemmett
